function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["spread of covid-19 among construction workers","rapid transmission risk of covid-19 in built environments","potential spread of covid-19 among construction workers","lack of open relaxation spaces within the built form of houses","inadequate isolation space for covid-19 patients within the house","transmission risk in common areas such as stairwells, lifts, and parking lots of buildings","potential future pandemics","interaction between urban environment and pandemics","concentration of individuals in gated communities may lead to rapid spread of contagious diseases if preventive measures are not strictly enforced","transmission of contagious diseases in the construction industry","economic impact of business failures in the construction industry"]}
